content: - designed by juan the yarn addict suggested materials any 4-weight yarn approximately 200 yds hook 6mm/us j abbreviations/meanings chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet scblo single_crochet in the back loop only st stitch/stitches fits a 22-24 head measures 11 across and 8 5 from the crown to the brim if you desire a smaller size just stop increasing after round 4 eliminate round 5 from the crown and stop at 48 sts note the chain 2 at the end of each round does not count as a stitch chain 4 slip into 1st st chain 2 does not count as a stitch round 1 12 double_crochet into chain circle slip into first st to close round chain 2 12 double_crochet round 2 2 double_crochet in each st until the end of the round slip into first st to close round chain 2 24 sts round 3 1 double_crochet in first st 2 double_crochet in the next continue placing 1 double_crochet then 2 double_crochet until the end of the round slip into first st to close round chain 2 36 sts round 4 1 double_crochet in each of the first 2 sts then 2 double_crochet in the next continue placing 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet until the end of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 48 sts round 5 1 double_crochet in each of the first 3 sts then 2 double_crochet in the next continue placing 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 double_crochet until the end of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts round 6 1 half_double_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts round 7 1 half_double_crochet in the back loop and 3rd bar of every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts round 8 again going in the back loop and 3rd bar decrease in the first 2 sts then place another decrease in the st you just came out of and the next st continue this sequence until the end of the round in the last st you came out of place 1 double_crochet slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts round 9 1 half_double_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts round 10 1 double_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 2 60 sts rounds 11 - 15 repeat rounds 6 through 10 note at this point if you d like to make this into a hat with a folded brim repeat rounds 6 through 10 two additional times then continue with rounds 16-18 to finish off the hat round 16 1 half_double_crochet in every st of the round slip into the first st to close round chain 1 does not count 60
